thread.title: Robert Kraft started mocking Deflategate seconds after receiving the Lombardi Trophy
thread.title_full: Robert Kraft started mocking Deflategate seconds after receiving the Lombardi Trophy

author: Molly Podlesny
title: Robert Kraft started mocking Deflategate seconds after receiving the Lombardi Trophy
text:
These jokes will never die.
Only a few minutes after winning Super Bowl 2017, Robert Kraft is cracking jokes about Deflategate by calling this Super Bowl win “the sweetest.”
He said “a lot has transpired over the last two years,” that made this Super Bowl win better than the Patriots’ fourth win over the Seahawks in 2015.
